questions.question: In case of curved vane force on plate is equal to
In case of flat vanes the jet deflects at an angle of
The horizontal component of the force on a curved surface is equal to

answers.a: Force on a vertical projection of the curved surface
answers.b: Weight of liquid vertically below the curved surface
answers.c: Product of pressure at its centroid and the area
answers.d: Weight of liquid retained by the curved area

questions.question: Find the force exerted by a jet of water of diameter 75mm on a stationary flat plate, the jet strikes the plate normally with the velocity of 20m/s.
